name: russian-sites
description: Russian translation of the svelte.dev sites

scripts.postinstall: npm run download && npm run apply && npm run setup
scripts.update: npm run download && npm run apply && npm run setup
scripts.build:kit: npm run apply && cd __BUILD/sites/kit.svelte.dev && npx pnpm i -D @sveltejs/adapter-node@next && npm run build  --ignore-scripts
scripts.build:svelte: npm run apply && cd __BUILD/sites/svelte.dev && npx pnpm i -D @sveltejs/adapter-node@next && npm run build  --ignore-scripts
